hero.title: Get Time Back. Focus on Care.
hero.description: AI-powered clinical documentation that reduces charting time by 50%. Spend less time typing, more time healing.

features.sectionDescription: Powerful AI tools designed specifically for clinical workflows

transcribe.title: Transcribe & Dictate
transcribe.description: Real-time medical transcription that understands clinical terminology and formats notes automatically.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get smart suggestions, coding recommendations, and decision support right in your workflow.

templates.title: Clinical Templates
templates.description: Pre-built templates for common visit types, customizable to match your documentation style.

context.title: Patient Context
context.description: Instant access to patient history, allergies, medications, and care gaps before each visit.

tasks.title: Smart Tasks
tasks.description: AI-generated follow-up tasks, referral tracking, and automated reminders.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Support for multiple languages to serve diverse patient populations.

howItWorks.sectionDescription: Seamlessly integrated into every phase of patient care

preVisit.title: Patient Pre-Visit
preVisit.description: Patients complete intake forms via SMS or WhatsApp

context.title: Context Ready
context.description: AI prepares patient summary with history and care gaps

documentation.title: Live Documentation
documentation.description: Ambient AI captures the conversation in real-time

review.title: Review & Sign
review.description: One-click review and sign-off on AI-generated notes

followUp.title: Follow-up
followUp.description: Automated patient summaries and task creation

pricing.sectionDescription: Simple, transparent pricing that scales with your practice

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Practice?
cta.description: Join thousands of providers delivering better care with AI-powered documentation

footer.tagline: AI-powered clinical documentation that helps physicians focus on patient care.
